meanings.definition: The quality of being agreeable or pleasant.
meanings.sent1: Her agreeabilities made everyone enjoy her company.
meanings.sent2: The agreeabilities of the garden made it a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent3: The agreeabilities of the puppy were evident in its wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The agreeabilities of the melody soothed the listeners' souls.
meanings.sent5: The agreeabilities of the sunset painted the sky in warm hues.

meanings.definition: The ability to be in harmony or accord with others.
meanings.sent1: Teamwork requires agreeabilities among all members.
meanings.sent2: His agreeabilities with different cultures made him a great diplomat.
meanings.sent3: The agreeabilities of the puzzle pieces made the game easy to solve.
meanings.sent4: In music, the agreeabilities of notes create beautiful harmonies.
meanings.sent5: The agreeabilities of the dancers' movements mesmerized the audience.
